history.content: According to the L&S website: https://lsadvising.berkeley.edu/policies/late-change-class-schedule, changing the grading option for EECS 16B will not count against the 2 late drop limit. The request must be submitted using the Qualtrics form and not CalCentral. If you already submitted a late change request via CalCentral, you can contact L&S at lspetitions@berkeley.edu to remove 16B grading changes from the limit. For more information, refer to the section labeled "SPRING 2022 ONLY: Modified policy and procedures for EECS 16B". The last day to make changes is April 29 at 11:59 PM. Note that this policy is only in effect for Spring 2022 and not for any other semesters.
history.subject: PSA: L&S Late Change of Schedule Policy for EECS 16B (Spring 2022 only)
